column4: I just saw a comment that EFI boot systems have a problem with usb stick booting. Have you got a EFI or a bios boot?
Bios. I heard something about sectors and not makeing the partition start at sector (or block) 1. Is that true and is there any ionformation about that?
I cannot enlighten you any more as to what to do, sorry
I have used usb-creator to make flash drives bootable with Ubuntu iso's
advantage is that you can dedicate 4 gig to config persistance across reboots
